entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
